column1: * 10 [[Cirion]] sends the first messengers to the [[Éothéod]].<ref name="TA2510">{{UT
* 25 [[Borondir]] delivers Cirion's plea for help to [[Eorl the Young]].<ref name="TA2510"/>
* 6 [[Eorl the Young]] and his ''[[éoherë]]'' set out for [[Gondor]].<ref name="TA2510"/>
* 15 [[Eorl the Young]] wins the victory of the [[Field of Celebrant]].<ref name="TA2510"/>
* The oaths of [[Cirion]] and [[Eorl the Young]] are spoken; [[Calenardhon]] is ceded to the [[Éothéod]] and becomes the Kingdom of [[Rohan]].<ref name="TA2510"/>
* [[Eorl the Young]] returns to the North; he brings the [[Rohirrim]] to settle in [[Calenardhon]].<ref name="TA"/>
